headers.subject: [gsl-issues] [Issue 22149] Alpha blending support
headers.x-spam-status: No, score=-2.4 required=5.0 tests=BAYES_00,NO_RELAYS autolearn=disabled version=3.2.4

body.para:
------- Additional comments from ssa@openoffice.org Wed Dec 17 02:40:47 -0800
2003 ------- SSA: The windows support is comitted to the CWS and the new icons look good. I checked imagelist creation as well. However, when testing if the SO icons still work I saw a few small magenta icons showing up in impress near the document sliders. This does not occur with Ximian's icons and I assume that the SO icons were not touched.
SSa->THB: May be you can have a look at that while verifying the whole patch.

--------------------------------------------------------------------- Please do not reply to this automatically generated notification from Issue Tracker. Please log onto the website and enter your comments. http://www.openoffice.org/project_issues.html#notification
